com.cmput301.recipebot.ui

Class HorizontalScrollableScrollView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • android.widget.ScrollView
            • com.cmput301.recipebot.ui.HorizontalScrollableScrollView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class HorizontalScrollableScrollView
extends android.widget.ScrollView
    A custom ScrollView taht doesn't interfere with horizontal swiping. Used to allow the viewpager swiping in our AbstractRecipeActivity
